caption: Connections between states by the factorization operators of the supersymmetric ladder of Hamiltonians $\{ H_{0},H_{1},H_{2},H_{3},H_{4}\}$ required in the calculation of the eigenstates up to $|4\rangle_{0}$ of the anharmonic oscillator Hamiltonian $H_{0}$ using the SEA. The last state to right is the edge state of the corresponding Hamiltonian $H_{r}$.
